website_summaries.verdict: Gears of War 4 offers brutish new weapons, new monster fodder, and excellent multiplayer modes, but the game drops the ball by introducing weak characters and a predictable story.
pros: Tight, responsive, and rewarding third-person shooting
Story campaign can be played in either solo or co-op modes

customer_reviews.title: Love It !!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing game, they have taken it back to basic which made 1-3 so good. The new enemies were good and different but still held the connection with the original trilogy which was fantastic. The new crew seem interesting and I am eager to see where this will go. cant wait for the next instalment

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice and fun game (if you like the genre) but ...
customer_reviews.text: I played all other episodes on a PC when I was young and I had to play this one as well. It's a nice and fun game (if you like the genre) but I'm finding the aiming a bit annoying (way to sensible in my opinion). Apart from that, the graphic is good and also gameplay is good. Download size is about 64GB which make this quite a heavy game. Recommended tho
